extendedInfo.description: Crooks and Liars http://crooksandliars.com is a politically left blog focusing on political events and the news coverage of them.Also includes The Professional Left Podcast. http://professionalleft.blogspot.comDriftglass and Blue Gal (The Professional Left) are award-winning bloggers who have been writing their own individual blogs since 2004. Both are also contributors to Crooks and Liars.Now get Crooks and Liars content and Professional Left Podcasts on the go.Easily swipe left or right to read previous/next article!Keywords: obama politics progressive liberal news rss podcast times msnbc olbermann maddow terry vaughn

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: Another absolutely horrid tablet app (perhaps the very worst) scaled up from iPhone app, due to droids refusal to distinguish a phone app from a tablet app. Save your money. Don\'t buy a nexus 10.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good ol\' liberal propaganda!!!
reviews.comment: This app is always there for me... for a good laugh that is!!!
reviews.author: Adam Cornish

reviews.title: Links don\'t work right...  but,
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to get the links working right...  content is still EXCELLENT, though!
reviews.author: Ezra Reis

reviews.comment: Easy way to get my C&L fix. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I cannot get this app to work. Just a blank screen. Window told me to refresh but that won\'t fix. HTC Evo 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff.
reviews.comment: Haven\'t had any problems. Quick way to read some articles on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I love having CnL on my phone. Can\'t say anything bad about that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Liberals...smh
reviews.comment: I got this app to try and see life from the point of view of stool pusher lovin baby killers...that\'s basically what being liberal is. Pro-choice(murder) gay marriage proponents who have absolutely no morals.
reviews.author: Jack Breed

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: A perfect mobile version of their desktop site. SWEET!!!
reviews.author: Pernell Babineaux
